user_query: I'm planning a surprise anniversary party for my parents and want to create a slideshow video with their favorite songs. Can you recommend some songs based on their preferences? Also, provide me with the lyrics for 'Almost Lover' by A Fine Frenzy.

TaskList.description: Collect information about the parents' favorite songs and music preferences.
Recommend songs based on the collected music preferences.
Fetch the lyrics for 'Almost Lover' by A Fine Frenzy.
Compile the recommended songs and lyrics into a slideshow format.
